detail_desc: 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and raw-edge hems.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets, a decorative back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Quilted puffer gilet in woven fabric with a detachable hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets and a rounded hem. Longer at the back. Lined.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a reversible sequin motif on the front, a jersey-lined, wrapover hood, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trousers in washed stretch twill with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side and slim legs.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in stretch denim with a zip fly and super-skinny legs.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
Hats in soft cotton jersey. One with an all-over print and one in a solid colour with ears sewn on top.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a lightly brushed finish. Lined, padded, drawstring hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Zipped handwarmer pockets, large patch pockets at the front, inner ribbing at the cuffs and a drawstring at the hem.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, long legs and press-stud fastenings.
Striped cotton jumper with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Joggers in a soft, patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Knee-length shorts in soft washed cotton with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a motif on the front.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Trousers in a cotton weave. Elasticated waist with a decorative bow at the front and small frill trim.

Sleeveless dress in a textured cotton weave with a V-neck, frilled collar and decorative drawstring with tassels. Flounces at the front that continue back over the shoulders, a smocked seam at the waist and lined skirt.
Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a round, rib-trimmed neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted, knee-length dress in lace with a small stand-up collar, concealed zip at the back, cap sleeves and an inset lace trim at the waist. Lined.
Set with a pair of braces and a bow tie. Adjustable, elasticated braces with metal fasteners and imitation leather details. Pre-tied bow tie in woven fabric with an adjustable fastening at the back.
Flat cap in woven fabric. Lined.

Blouse in a crisp cotton weave with double-layered, voluminous puff sleeves that have pleats on the shoulders and elastication around the hems. Stand-up collar and a visible zip with a long tab at the back of the neck.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses. Plastic sidepieces with a stylish inset section in gold-coloured metal.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
3/4-length leggings in sturdy jersey with wide ribbing for best fit over the tummy.
Joggers in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, kangaroo pocket and ribbed hems.

Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a ribbed section over the foot and slightly higher shaft at the heel for optimum fit. Reinforced heel and toe for perfect, friction-free comfort.
Short skirt in cotton twill with sparkly stone appliqués and a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
Short shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Trainers in snakeskin-patterned imitation leather with details in a contrasting colour and lacing at the front. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Pyjama T-shirt and shorts in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with contrasting colour ribbing around the neckline and sleeves. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Fitted dress in stretch velour with a small stand-up collar, hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck, an open back, long sleeves and a seam at the waist. Unlined.
Cropped top in jersey containing glittery threads with a small stand-up collar, zip at the back of the neck and long sleeves.
Treggings in stretch twill with fake front pockets and real back pockets.Wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.

Blouse in a crêpe weave with lace embroidery on the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fully lined, patterned bikini bottoms with a high waist.

Blouse in a textured weave with a slight sheen. Concealed buttons at the top and a small stand-up collar with a frill that continues down the button band. Double-layered yoke with a gathered seam at the back and long, voluminous sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs.
High-waisted jersey leggings.
Short-sleeved dress in printed cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and a flounced skirt.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a fine knit with fringing. No fasteners.
Warm-lined boots in imitation leather with lacing at the front, a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles.

Ankle boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides, a loop at the back and wedge heels. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and chunky thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 7.5 cm.
Jumper in soft, fine, rib-knit wool containing some cashmere with a round neckline, gently dropped shoulders and wide sleeves that taper to the cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.
Short-sleeved top in soft viscose with an opening and button at the back of the neck.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Satin mules with a wide, padded foot strap. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 3 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.
Joggers in heavy sweatshirt fabric with elasticated ribbing at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in cotton crêpe slub jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

Lace top with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. 3/4-length sleeves with a flared flounce at the cuffs, and raw, scalloped edges at the cuffs and hem. Partly lined.
Knee-length shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist and patch front pockets.
Pyjamas in a soft cotton flannel. Long-sleeved shirt with notch lapels, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.

Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. High slits in the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Short, A-line dungaree dress in washed denim with a chest pocket, buttons at the sides and adjustable straps with metal fasteners.
Printed jersey top with short cap sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved blouse in satin with a V-neck with ties at the top, short, wide sleeves, and a rounded hem.
Hat in a soft, fine knit containing some wool.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Long-sleeved, off-the-shoulder jersey top with a double frill in woven fabric and narrow elastication at the top.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side, fake back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Shirt in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset,wide sides and string back.
Long-sleeved playsuit in stretch, patterned jersey with a V-neck and wrapover with a concealed press-stud at the front. Elasticated seam at the waist and short, wide legs.
Sleeveless Christmas tree dress in cotton jersey with tiered organza flounces and sewn-on pompoms.
Jumper in a soft, fluffy knit with decorative sequins at the top, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Long-sleeved, off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with wide foldover ribbing around the neckline and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Ballet pumps with fine details, rounded toes and a strap over the foot. Satin linings and insoles and finely fluted soles. Heel 0.4 cm.
Soft slippers in imitation suede with a moccasin seam at the front. Pile linings and insoles.
Short skirt in imitation leather. High waist with a press-stud and concealed zip at the back, and front pockets. Unlined.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details. Button fly and slightly wider, tapered legs.

Blouse in airy plumeti chiffon with gathered seams at the front to create a gently draped effect. Sweetheart neckline at the front, a straight, low-cut neckline at the back and 3/4-length balloon sleeves with gathered elastication at the shoulders and cuffs. Seam at the hem with a gently flared peplum and narrow elastication at the back. Jersey-lined bodice.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey an appliqué on the front and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Imitation leather sandals with trainer soles, crossover straps at the front and an adjustable hook and loop tab at the heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
T-shirt in slub linen jersey with a round neckline, short sleeves and straight-cut hem.
Blouse in a soft weave with a small collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Fully lined, textured bikini bottoms with a low, elasticated waist and high-cut at the back.

Sports vest top in ribbed, fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and decorative seams at the sides. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
